text: Arthur Fry (born 19 August 1931)Geburtstage am 19. August at geboren.am is a retired American inventor and scientist. He is known as the co-creator of the Post-it Note. In 2010, Art Fry was added into the National Inventors Hall of Fame. He was born in Minneapolis, Minnesota. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:American inventors Category:Scientists from Minneapolis
title: Arthur Fry
